name: Angelo Cappellini SANSONE bed
description: Bed from the Italian manufacturer ANGELO CAPPELLINI, OPERA collection, model SANSONE. The Italian double bed is made in classical style. The frame is made of solid wood. Characteristics Material: solid wood, leather / fabric Width: 208 cm Depth: 237 cm Height: 102 centimeters corona 2.0 For Corona render, it is recommended to use a version no lower than 1.5, since the glossiness of materials is adjusted to the PBR.
